task_background: Prepare the covert intelligence hub for an imminent high-stakes intelligence briefing by securing sensitive materials, activating communication systems, and ensuring operational readiness.

tasks.task_description: Place the object with id 'visitor_logbook_1' inside the filing cabinet with id 'filing_cabinet_1'.
Place the object with id 'ashtray_1' on top of the push cart with id 'push_cart_1'.
Find the humming rotary telephone and activate it for secure communications.
Activate the coffee percolator bearing the CIA 1952 inscription for the briefing.
Type the alert message 'URGENT' on the typewriter missing the E key.
Locate the only CIA-branded mug that is chipped and pour coffee into it from the activated percolator.
Have robot_1 and robot_2 cooperate to open the floor safe requiring two distinct keys.
Have robot_1 and robot_2 jointly activate the dusty globe's hidden alarm button.
